item.title: Small and medium-sized enterprises in Australia have the opportunity to utilize Microsoft Lync through iiNet
item.description: Parallels, a company that provides platforms for delivering cloud services, has announced the successful deployment of Microsoft Lync through Parallels Automation at iiNet. iiNet is the second-largest DSL internet provider in Australia and a major competitor in the countryâ€™s telecommunications market. This new Microsoft Lync service from iiNet will provide small and medium enterprises (SMEs) across Australia with access to affordable, enterprise-grade voice, telephony, and video calling services. Source: iiNet website.
